name: Carnage King
description:
Carnage King is a top-down Car Game that takes place in an Stadium Arena filled with hostile enemy cars. You play as an All-American Monster Truck that can level up and upgrade itself to combat the hordes of cars and dodge the incoming cars. The aim is to survive 5 minutes in the Arena without being destroyed!

Features
Arena
Cars
America
Roguelike
Action

Credits
Alex
Alessio
Cliff
Louis
